toc.value: üöÄ Exciting Times at Our Badminton Club! üè∏

frontMatter.title: Badminton Club Update
frontMatter.summary: Our badminton club membership is full. Only current members can join Club Nights. Updates will be shared soon.

prev.title: Match Week Update: Upcoming Games and Club Nights
prev.summary: Get ready for an exciting week with 4 matches in the Men's and Ladies' divisions and check out our club night schedule.

next.title: Badminton at Claremont Stadium Tonight!
next.summary: Join us tonight at Claremont Stadium for exciting badminton matches with courts open from 8:30pm to 11pm. Don't miss the action!
